title: Bo Derek on "10" Movie & Filming Nude Scenes: Johnny Carson's Tonight Show, 1979
description: Bo Derek promotes her movie "Ten" while making her first appearance on the Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson. She promotes the movie 10 and discusses her private life, corn rows, her fitness and eating habits, filming nude scenes, and being the perfect woman. The audience asks Bo Derek to rate Johnny Carson on a scale of 1 to 10. Very funny moment.
